description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning

Standard

Reach 3

+24 vs AC; 3d10+10 damage plus 4d6 lightning damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+24 vs AC; 2d10+12 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy moves to a space where it flanks the dragon, at-will

+22 vs Fortitude; 3d12+8 damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an adjacent enemy moves or shifts, at-will

+24 vs AC; 2d10+12 damage, and the dragon grabs the target. If the dragon uses double attack while grabbing a target, it must target a grabbed creature with at least one attack if it is able.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Lightning

Standard

Close blast 3

+22 vs Reflex; 3d10+8 lightning damage, and the dragon pushes the target 4 squares. If the attack hit at least one target, the dragon makes a secondary attack against a creature within 10 squares that was not a target of the primary attack. Miss: Half damage.

Secondary Attack: +22 vs Reflex; 2d12+7 lightning damage, and the dragon pushes the target 2 squares.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +22 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Healing

Minor

The dragon regains 180 hit points and gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

system.biography:
HP 723; Bloodied 361 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 25 lightning 		Init +17 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 33Fort 35Ref 32Will 32
Speed 8, fly 10 (hover), overland flight 12, swim 8

Con 25 (+17)		Dex 24 (+17)
Int 14 (+12)		Wis 14 (+12)
Cha 22 (+16)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Unaligned
Skills History +17, Intimidate +21Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 22 | Insight 22
